name: TopDownShuter
description:
Once a nuclear power plant exploded and radiation filled half of the planet!
You are lucky and you are one of those who survived in this world.
Because of the great radiation, people have mutated, but all is not lost yet!
These creatures are everywhere. They have strange changes in skin color...
Do not forget to take a couple of guns with you, I think they will be useful to you Forget the money!
Now the main thing is to survive!
Collect H2O cylinders and exchange them for useful things You need to kill mutants and save the world!
    Move for PC:            Move for Android:
-Up "W"                  -Right joystick: "Atack"
-Way down "S"            -Left joystick: "Move"
-To the left "D"         -Next weapon: "Click on the weapon"
-To the right "A"
-Next weapon "Q"
